content.text:
# Pudsey (ward)

| party1      = Conservative
| councillor2 = Simon Seary
| party2      = Conservative
| councillor3 = Trish Smith
| party3      = Reform UK
| population     = 19,116
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Pudsey is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in west Leeds, West Yorkshire, including the town of Pudsey and residential areas of Swinnow and Tyersal.
